name: AVAssetDownloadTask
desc: A session used to download HTTP Live Streaming assets.

items.name: var urlAsset: AVURLAsset
items.desc: The asset that this task downloads.

items.name: var loadedTimeRanges: [NSValue]
items.desc: The time ranges of the downloaded media that are ready for playback.

items.name: var options: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The configuration options for the task.
